channel.title: Potato Garden on
channel.description: Recent content in Potato Garden on

item.title: Burger Shack
item.description: A simple burger shop game. Idea by TacoShack Economy Discord Bot. Where you make / sell burgers and sell them. By time, you’ll have automation and create restaurant chain like McDonalds.

item.title: By the Sea
item.description: Sit by the sea with your friends online

item.title: Clippy
item.description: A quick clipboard for writing down quick notes. Format: [category]: [content] Example: todo: water the plants

item.title: Communiquette
item.description: A website replacing the communication book of ITS. Teachers Writing daily reports Writing monthly reports Students Homework upload Image Manual writing

item.title: Custom Keyboard
item.description: What I want on my custom keyboard Prebuilt Keychron V1 Keycaps Salmon Planets Cute cat idk Switches Tangerine Alpacas I made a Youtube Playlist to cross them down.

item.title: Expose
item.description: exposing a certain someone Todo Collect every screenshots Summarize his actions and behaviour Timeline

item.title: ITS 01
item.description: A web to remember and mark down the history of the first ITS class. Ideas Timeline of every people who left and joined

item.title: Just Trains
item.description: A study-like website to watch trains. Maybe explain how I love it and how good it is.

item.title: Language Documentation
item.description: A documentation for languages written in English. It will teach about that language in the same format. Documentation will be written like a library documentation.

item.title: Life Goals
item.description: What I want to achieve in my life. Move out of Thailand Options Somehow make enough money myself to move out (Unlikely) Get a job abroad somehow (less likely) Scholarships (more likely) Countries I want go BEAUTIFUL nice trains Netherlands Norway Switzerland Sweden New Zealand (Friendly People) GOOD Australia Canada (Friendly People) Singapore NO OTHER CHOICE USA England China

item.title: Moeyly
item.description: A personal portfolio website for my friend Moey. Todo About me Hobbies Drawing Art Eating Favourite Food & Drinks

item.title: Pat's Time Wheel
item.description: Display the time schedule of my day as a wheel. Maybe create this as a template for others to create.

item.title: Patato.live
item.description: A personal website telling what I do. Basically a portfolio website. Todo Projects Paimonade Digitots CarQueue Timeline of my coding journey Reference scroll to More Links Twitch Discord Garden Languages I speak

item.title: Technoblade's Tribute
item.description: A website for pressing F to pay respect for Technoblade. How Each auth user can increment the counter of F’s

item.title: Tell the Duck
item.description: A theraphy website. Idea by Rubber duck debugging - Wikipedia but instead of fixing your bugs, it’ll hopefully help with your sadness, stress, anxiety or whatever.

item.title: The Space
item.description: A cozy website with a fireplace and a clock. Kinda like a studying website but for people who are sad. Built from Pat’s desired ideal cozy place.

item.title: To-do List
item.description: Work Study for the Exam English Physics HSK Thai Math maybe Thai Language Thai Science English Math English Chemistry Chinese Language Music Project

item.title: Tung Sua (ตั้วสัว - ตั๋วนั่ง)
item.description: A web for booking what seat do you want at school. Kinda like in the theatre that you book a seat.

item.title: Untitled Train Game
item.description: A game inspired by the Netflix Series Snowpiercer What to do Basic Movement - Q/E Accelerate ZOOM Fast Movement World Map

item.title: Why I want to move to the Netherlands
item.description: Here's why I want to move to the Netherlands Weather Nice chill weather. That’s all. And I love it. Bikes I love biking.

item.title: Why I'd not like to move to the US, Canada and China
item.description: I used to like Canada and the US. But there are some things that I really don’t like. Less Trains that I expected I like trains.

item.title: Wishlist
item.description: What I want to buy and what I want to achieve in life Life Goals Setup Better Cable Extension Headphones with a spring cord Logitech G733 Second Monitor Phone Macbook Custom Keyboard VR Oculus Clockwork Gameshell
